author: cms-sw
body:
- update python3 to version 3.9.14 ( which is a security release)
  - Can not update python to 3.10 series which requires OpenSSL 1.1.1. As we still support `slc7` releases which contain openssl 1.0.2. Although we can maintain two branches ( one for slc7 and one for el8) but lets stick to python 3.9
- update pip3 to latest version 22.2.2
- update setuptools to 63.4.3 ( can not update to latest 65.x or 64.x series as numpy does not work with that)
- Update many pip based packages
  - Some of the packages are not yet using their latest versions due to build issues ( new `meson` backend build system  not working correctly)
  - Keep `numpy <1.23.0` as keras, `TensorFlow` and xgboost does not work with `numpy >= 1.23.0`
  - `Keras` version also need to be at `2.6.0` to match the `TensorFlow` version series
  - Patched dxr to use `Markup` from `markupsafe` as Jinja2 `3.1.2` version does not provide `Markup`
title: Python 3.9.14 plus bulk update of many python package
